---
layout: docs
page_title: "Release notes: Oracle DB plugin"
description: >-
  Oracle is one of the supported plugins for the database secrets engine. This
  plugin generates database credentials dynamically based on configured roles
  for the Oracle database.

# Release notes: Oracle plugin

[ce_repo]: https://github.com/hashicorp/vault-plugin-database-oracle

Current<br />version | Edition    | Runtime  | Code source
:------------------: | ---------- | -------- | -----------
`0.13.0`             | Enterprise | External | Binary: `vault-plugin-database-oracle*`
`0.10.2`             | Community  | External | [hashicorp/vault-plugin-database-oracle][ce_repo]


## October 6, 2025

Edition    | Version  | Vault requirement 
---------- | -------- | -----------------
Enterprise | `0.13.0` | 1.21.0+

### Features and bug fixes ((#0130-updates))

- None.

### Technical updates ((#0130-tech))

- Bumped `go` version to 1.25.1.

### Direct dependency updates ((#0130-direct)) 

?      | Dependency                     | Old    | New
:----: | ------------------------------ | ------ | ------
&uarr; | <tt>github.com/hashicorp/vault/api</tt> | 1.16.0 | 1.22.0
&uarr; | <tt>github.com/hashicorp/vault/sdk</tt> | 0.17.0 | 0.20.0

## March 5, 2025

Edition    | Version
---------- | --------
Enterprise | `0.11.0`

### Features and bug fixes ((#0110-updates))

- Installed license checking.

### Technical updates ((#0110-tech))

- Bumped `go` version to 1.23.6.
- Bumped Oracle Instant Client from 19.23 to 19.26.

### Direct dependency updates ((#0110-direct))

?      | Dependency                     | Old    | New
:----: | ------------------------------ | ------ | ------
&uarr; | <tt>github.com/hashicorp/vault/api</tt> | 1.15.0 | 1.16.0

&uarr; | <tt>github.com/ory/dockertest/v3</tt>   | 3.10.0 | 3.11.0
